messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Adult unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/30/2002 7:06:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... And helping A LOT before-hand!! Thanks, BTW! Yes, there s an unschooled soap star who ll
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/30/2002 7:06:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> << Didn't Sandra's Conference say that she will have a soap star that was
> brought up unschooled? >>
>
> That's Kelly's conference!
> (But I'll be there. <g>)

And helping A LOT before-hand!! Thanks, BTW!

Yes, there's an unschooled soap star who'll tell her story. I grew up with
her. Fiona was not schooled until fourth grade (when/where we met) because
she lived in Jamaica. She attended school from 4th-7th grade and then she was
trusted to even live on her own in London and New York at 14. Fascinating
story. As soon as I "found" unschooling, I realized she was my personal
poster child for unschooling.

We'll also have Ned Vare and Luz Shosie whose son will graduate from college
next week. Cassidy, their son, never went to school; he won't be with us, but
his parents should be able to answer all those questions you might have.

I hope you can join us!

Kelly






Kelly Lovejoy, Coordinator
Schools Out Support
mailto:coordinator@...
803-776-4849
Fax: 803-776-7006
http://www.schoolsoutsupport.org
